live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 14:29 PT.
59770.summary: Some customers in the Dartmoor area of Coquitlam are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59770.title: Apr 4 - Coquitlam (Dartmoor) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
